rows.title: How to join (merge) data frames (inner, outer, left, right)
Unfortunately MyApp has stopped. How can I solve this?
List of lists changes reflected across sublists unexpectedly
What is The Rule of Three?

47:
<p>Alongside the accepted answer that explained the problem correctly, instead of creating a list with duplicated elements using following code:</p>
<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python">[[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>]*<span class="hljs-number">4</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> _ <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-number">3</span>)]
</code></pre>
<p>Also, you can use <a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/itertools.html#itertools.repeat" rel="nofollow noreferrer"><code>itertools.repeat()</code></a> to create an iterator object of repeated elements:</p>
<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python"><span class="hljs-meta">&gt;&gt;&gt; </span>a = <span class="hljs-built_in">list</span>(repeat(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>,<span class="hljs-number">4</span>))
[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>]
<span class="hljs-meta">&gt;&gt;&gt; </span>a[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>] = <span class="hljs-number">5</span>
<span class="hljs-meta">&gt;&gt;&gt; </span>a
[<span class="hljs-number">5</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>]
</code></pre>
<p>P.S. If you're using NumPy and you only want to create an array of ones or zeroes you can use <a href="https://numpy.org/doc/stable/reference/generated/numpy.ones.html" rel="nofollow noreferrer"><code>np.ones</code></a> and <a href="https://numpy.org/doc/stable/reference/generated/numpy.zeros.html" rel="nofollow noreferrer"><code>np.zeros</code></a> and/or for other numbers use <a href="https://numpy.org/doc/stable/reference/generated/numpy.repeat.html" rel="nofollow noreferrer"><code>np.repeat</code></a>:</p>
<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python"><span class="hljs-meta">&gt;&gt;&gt; </span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> numpy <span class="hljs-keyword">as</span> np
<span class="hljs-meta">&gt;&gt;&gt; </span>np.ones(<span class="hljs-number">4</span>)
array([<span class="hljs-number">1.</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1.</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1.</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1.</span>])
<span class="hljs-meta">&gt;&gt;&gt; </span>np.ones((<span class="hljs-number">4</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>))
array([[<span class="hljs-number">1.</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1.</span>],
       [<span class="hljs-number">1.</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1.</span>],
       [<span class="hljs-number">1.</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1.</span>],
       [<span class="hljs-number">1.</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1.</span>]])
<span class="hljs-meta">&gt;&gt;&gt; </span>np.zeros((<span class="hljs-number">4</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>))
array([[<span class="hljs-number">0.</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0.</span>],
       [<span class="hljs-number">0.</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0.</span>],
       [<span class="hljs-number">0.</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0.</span>],
       [<span class="hljs-number">0.</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0.</span>]])
<span class="hljs-meta">&gt;&gt;&gt; </span>np.repeat([<span class="hljs-number">7</span>], <span class="hljs-number">10</span>)
array([<span class="hljs-number">7</span>, <span class="hljs-number">7</span>, <span class="hljs-number">7</span>, <span class="hljs-number">7</span>, <span class="hljs-number">7</span>, <span class="hljs-number">7</span>, <span class="hljs-number">7</span>, <span class="hljs-number">7</span>, <span class="hljs-number">7</span>, <span class="hljs-number">7</span>])
</code></pre>
48:
<p>Found this great table at <a href="http://wiki.python.org/moin/MovingToPythonFromOtherLanguages" rel="noreferrer">http://wiki.python.org/moin/MovingToPythonFromOtherLanguages</a></p>

<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python">Python indexes <span class="hljs-keyword">and</span> slices <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> a six-element <span class="hljs-built_in">list</span>.
Indexes <span class="hljs-built_in">enumerate</span> the elements, slices <span class="hljs-built_in">enumerate</span> the spaces between the elements.

Index <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> rear:    -<span class="hljs-number">6</span>  -<span class="hljs-number">5</span>  -<span class="hljs-number">4</span>  -<span class="hljs-number">3</span>  -<span class="hljs-number">2</span>  -<span class="hljs-number">1</span>      a=[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>,<span class="hljs-number">1</span>,<span class="hljs-number">2</span>,<span class="hljs-number">3</span>,<span class="hljs-number">4</span>,<span class="hljs-number">5</span>]    a[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>:]==[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>,<span class="hljs-number">2</span>,<span class="hljs-number">3</span>,<span class="hljs-number">4</span>,<span class="hljs-number">5</span>]
Index <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> front:    <span class="hljs-number">0</span>   <span class="hljs-number">1</span>   <span class="hljs-number">2</span>   <span class="hljs-number">3</span>   <span class="hljs-number">4</span>   <span class="hljs-number">5</span>      <span class="hljs-built_in">len</span>(a)==<span class="hljs-number">6</span>          a[:<span class="hljs-number">5</span>]==[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>,<span class="hljs-number">1</span>,<span class="hljs-number">2</span>,<span class="hljs-number">3</span>,<span class="hljs-number">4</span>]
                   +---+---+---+---+---+---+    a[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>]==<span class="hljs-number">0</span>            a[:-<span class="hljs-number">2</span>]==[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>,<span class="hljs-number">1</span>,<span class="hljs-number">2</span>,<span class="hljs-number">3</span>]
                   | a | b | c | d | e | f |    a[<span class="hljs-number">5</span>]==<span class="hljs-number">5</span>            a[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>:<span class="hljs-number">2</span>]==[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>]
                   +---+---+---+---+---+---+    a[-<span class="hljs-number">1</span>]==<span class="hljs-number">5</span>           a[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>:-<span class="hljs-number">1</span>]==[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>,<span class="hljs-number">2</span>,<span class="hljs-number">3</span>,<span class="hljs-number">4</span>]
Slice <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> front:  :   <span class="hljs-number">1</span>   <span class="hljs-number">2</span>   <span class="hljs-number">3</span>   <span class="hljs-number">4</span>   <span class="hljs-number">5</span>   :    a[-<span class="hljs-number">2</span>]==<span class="hljs-number">4</span>
Slice <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> rear:   :  -<span class="hljs-number">5</span>  -<span class="hljs-number">4</span>  -<span class="hljs-number">3</span>  -<span class="hljs-number">2</span>  -<span class="hljs-number">1</span>   :
                                                b=a[:]
                                                b==[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>,<span class="hljs-number">1</span>,<span class="hljs-number">2</span>,<span class="hljs-number">3</span>,<span class="hljs-number">4</span>,<span class="hljs-number">5</span>] (shallow copy of a)</code></pre>

<p>This is just for some extra info...
Consider the list below </p>

<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python"><span class="hljs-meta">&gt;&gt;&gt; </span>l=[<span class="hljs-number">12</span>,<span class="hljs-number">23</span>,<span class="hljs-number">345</span>,<span class="hljs-number">456</span>,<span class="hljs-number">67</span>,<span class="hljs-number">7</span>,<span class="hljs-number">945</span>,<span class="hljs-number">467</span>]
</code></pre>

<p>Few other tricks for reversing the list:</p>

<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python"><span class="hljs-meta">&gt;&gt;&gt; </span>l[<span class="hljs-built_in">len</span>(l):-<span class="hljs-built_in">len</span>(l)-<span class="hljs-number">1</span>:-<span class="hljs-number">1</span>]
[<span class="hljs-number">467</span>, <span class="hljs-number">945</span>, <span class="hljs-number">7</span>, <span class="hljs-number">67</span>, <span class="hljs-number">456</span>, <span class="hljs-number">345</span>, <span class="hljs-number">23</span>, <span class="hljs-number">12</span>]

<span class="hljs-meta">&gt;&gt;&gt; </span>l[:-<span class="hljs-built_in">len</span>(l)-<span class="hljs-number">1</span>:-<span class="hljs-number">1</span>]
[<span class="hljs-number">467</span>, <span class="hljs-number">945</span>, <span class="hljs-number">7</span>, <span class="hljs-number">67</span>, <span class="hljs-number">456</span>, <span class="hljs-number">345</span>, <span class="hljs-number">23</span>, <span class="hljs-number">12</span>]

<span class="hljs-meta">&gt;&gt;&gt; </span>l[<span class="hljs-built_in">len</span>(l)::-<span class="hljs-number">1</span>]
[<span class="hljs-number">467</span>, <span class="hljs-number">945</span>, <span class="hljs-number">7</span>, <span class="hljs-number">67</span>, <span class="hljs-number">456</span>, <span class="hljs-number">345</span>, <span class="hljs-number">23</span>, <span class="hljs-number">12</span>]

<span class="hljs-meta">&gt;&gt;&gt; </span>l[::-<span class="hljs-number">1</span>]
[<span class="hljs-number">467</span>, <span class="hljs-number">945</span>, <span class="hljs-number">7</span>, <span class="hljs-number">67</span>, <span class="hljs-number">456</span>, <span class="hljs-number">345</span>, <span class="hljs-number">23</span>, <span class="hljs-number">12</span>]

<span class="hljs-meta">&gt;&gt;&gt; </span>l[-<span class="hljs-number">1</span>:-<span class="hljs-built_in">len</span>(l)-<span class="hljs-number">1</span>:-<span class="hljs-number">1</span>]
[<span class="hljs-number">467</span>, <span class="hljs-number">945</span>, <span class="hljs-number">7</span>, <span class="hljs-number">67</span>, <span class="hljs-number">456</span>, <span class="hljs-number">345</span>, <span class="hljs-number">23</span>, <span class="hljs-number">12</span>]
</code></pre>
49:
<p>First, you check which point your app has crashed (<code>Unfortunately, MyApp has stopped.</code>). For this, you can use <code>Log.e("TAG", "Message");</code>, using this line you can see your app log in logcat.</p>

<p>After that, you find which point your app has stopped it's very easy to solve at your side. </p>
<p>Check your <code>Logcat</code> message and see your <code>Manifest</code> file. There should be something missing like defining the <code>Activity,</code>User permission`, etc.</p>

<p>If your app for some reason crashes without good stacktrace. Try debug it from first line, and go line by line until crash. Then you will have answer, which line is causing you trouble. Proably you could then wrapp it into try catch block and print error output.</p>

<p>You can also get this error message on its own, without any stack trace or any further error message.</p>

<p>In this case you need to make sure your Android manifest is configured correctly (including any manifest merging happening from a library and any activity that would come from a library), and pay particular attention to the first activity displayed in your application in your manifest files.</p>

<p>First, you need to check where and why your app has been crashed <code>(Unfortunately, MyApp has stopped.).</code> With the help of <code>LOG</code>, you can figure it out what went wrong.</p>

<p>After that, you find which point your app has stopped fix that from your point.</p>
